New Records: Evin Lewis scored 102 runs, the highest score in the series
Key Match Events: West Indies won the 3rd ODI by 8 wickets (DLS method)
Sri Lanka was bowled out for 156/3 in 23 overs
Pre-Game Insights: SLC announced the 3rd ODI as 'Pink Ribbon Day'
Post-Match Reflections: Sammy labels 2-1 series loss to Sri Lanka a'moral victory'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shere-Fane Rutherford is the highest run scorer with 204 runs
Wanindu Hasaranga is the highest wicket taker with 6 wickets
